summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3802 for the improvement of East 53rd Street and East 53rd Street produced, from 27th Avenue Northeast to 30th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46844, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
